mapper.select: select a.id, a.kw,a.price ,a.stock ,a.title ,a.label,a.comment, case when b.price is not null then b.price else -1 end as price2, case when b.price is not null then b.price-a.price else -1 end as diff from my_stock a left join goods b on a.title = b.title and b.shop = '宁波老猎人电玩店' and etl_date=#{now} order by diff
